 2020-08342020-10-26PSPC,  ,  ,  ,  , 
ActCanada Post Corporation Act
PrecisAppointment of SUROMITRA SANATANI of Vancouver, British Columbia, to be interim Chairperson of the Board of Directors of the Canada Post Corporation, to hold office during pleasure for a term of one year or until such time as a new Chairperson is appointed, whichever occurs first.
